prompts.title: Literature Review Framework
prompts.description: Generate a structured framework for conducting a literature review in a specific field
prompts.content:
I need to conduct a comprehensive literature review on {research_topic} within the field of {field_of_study}. Please provide a structured framework that includes:

1. Key search terms and boolean operators to use
2. Recommended academic databases for this field
3. Criteria for inclusion and exclusion of papers
4. A template for organizing findings (themes, methodologies, gaps)
5. Strategies for critically analyzing the selected papers
6. Approaches for synthesizing findings across multiple papers
7. Common pitfalls to avoid when conducting a literature review in this field

My review needs to cover literature from the past {time_period} years and should focus particularly on {specific_aspect} of the topic.

variables.name: Research Topic
variables.description: The specific research topic you're investigating
variables.placeholder: e.g., Machine Learning in Healthcare

variables.name: Field of Study
variables.description: The broader academic discipline
variables.placeholder: e.g., Computer Science, Psychology, Economics

variables.name: Time Period
variables.description: How many years back the review should cover

variables.name: Specific Aspect
variables.description: A particular aspect or dimension of the topic to focus on
variables.placeholder: e.g., ethical implications, methodological approaches, practical applications

prompts.title: Research Question Formulation
prompts.description: Develop well-structured research questions for your study
prompts.content:
I'm designing a research study on {research_topic} within the field of {field_of_study}. My research aims to {research_aim}.

Please help me formulate 3-5 well-structured research questions that:

1. Address gaps in the current literature
2. Are specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART)
3. Align with {research_methodology} methodology
4. Consider ethical implications and constraints
5. Build upon existing theoretical frameworks in this field

For each research question, please provide:
- The question itself
- Rationale for its importance
- Potential challenges in answering it
- Suggestions for operationalizing key variables

prompts.title: Research Methodology Design
prompts.description: Create a comprehensive research methodology for your study
prompts.content:
I'm conducting research on {research_topic} and need to design a comprehensive methodology. My research question is: {research_question}

Please help me develop a detailed research methodology that includes:

1. Research approach justification ({research_approach})
2. Data collection methods appropriate for this study
3. Sampling strategy and sample size considerations
4. Data analysis techniques
5. Validity and reliability measures
6. Ethical considerations specific to this research
7. Limitations and potential biases to address
8. Timeline for implementation

The study will be conducted in {research_setting} with {participant_description} as participants.

prompts.title: Data Analysis Plan
prompts.description: Develop a comprehensive plan for analyzing research data
prompts.content:
I've collected {data_type} data for my research on {research_topic} and need to develop a comprehensive data analysis plan. The data includes {data_description}.

Please help me create a detailed data analysis plan that includes:

1. Data preparation steps (cleaning, normalization, handling missing values)
2. Appropriate statistical tests or analytical methods for {research_question}
3. Justification for chosen analytical approaches
4. Software recommendations (preferably {preferred_software})
5. Step-by-step analysis procedure
6. Interpretation guidelines for results
7. Visualization recommendations for key findings
8. Potential limitations and how to address them

My analysis needs to account for {specific_considerations}.

prompts.title: Literature Synthesis Framework
prompts.description: Create a framework for synthesizing literature on a specific topic
prompts.content:
I need to synthesize literature on {research_topic} within the field of {field_of_study}. I've reviewed approximately {number_of_sources} sources published between {start_year} and {end_year}.

Please provide a framework for synthesizing this literature that includes:

1. Approaches for identifying key themes, patterns, and contradictions
2. Methods for comparing and contrasting methodologies across studies
3. Strategies for evaluating the quality and relevance of different sources
4. Techniques for identifying gaps and future research directions
5. Approaches for integrating theoretical perspectives
6. Structure for presenting the synthesis (chronological, thematic, methodological)
7. Guidelines for maintaining objectivity and avoiding bias

The synthesis will focus particularly on {specific_focus} and will be used for {intended_purpose}.
